name: Farm Empire 3D
description:
The good old farm in the new shape!
The engaging process of planting and harvesting your crops! A variety of animals and plants you can breed and cultivate on your farm.
When you harvest your crops, visit the Market to sell them and earn a fortune.
Develop your farming business even more efficiently.
There are a ton of upgrades in the game that make farming even more enjoyable!
Want to become a farmer without spending too much time and effort? With Farm Empire, it’s never been easier!

HARVEST wonderful crops and unlock new plots.
WATER your sprouts to increase your income.
CULTIVATE the most unusual plants.
DISCOVER new plant types.
FIND new seeds in shoeboxes.
EARN money and bonuses by selling your crops on the market.

Features:
- Simple controls
- Fun gameplay
- Awesome design
- Likeable interface
